children.name: tag_line
children.description: A short tag line that appears above the main heading in the hero banner.

children.name: heading
children.description: The main heading that describes the information request page and its purpose.

children.name: paragraph
children.description: A paragraph that provides more details about the information request and what users can expect.

children.name: button_text
children.description: The call-to-action button text that encourages users to take action.

children.name: button_link
children.description: The URL that a user should be taken to when they click the button.

children.name: image
children.description: A hero image that visually represents the products or services being offered.

children.name: content
children.description: Text that introduces the logo gallery section, typically describing partnerships or clients.

children.name: label
children.description: A label that appears above the features heading.
